name: Vaporwaves
description:
Waporwaves is an arena shooter prototype. 

Take it easy, relax and enjoy atomsphere of 80's. Survive as many waves as you can, but don't force yourself - it suppose to be relaxing expirience.

Game is in prototype phase, and probably will stay this way - there's so many new things to learn for beginner game develoeper, I just can't wait to start next project!

If you like the music - please, support the creator, Stevia Sphere (https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/)

Also, you can support soundbible, great source of free sounds. (http://soundbible.com/1998-Gun-Fire.html - gunfire from deathscreen)
